svg.title: Cat Digestive System - Ventral View
svg.desc: Interactive SVG of a domestic cat digestive system showing the gastrointestinal tract, accessory organs, and peritoneal structures for pre-veterinary anatomy study.

g.text: R = Right (viewer left) | L = Left (viewer right)

svg.text: AnatoView v1.0.0 - Cat Digestive Model - 15 labeled structures
